testcase.name: Seller edits a product with an empty product category
testcase.system-out: Given the seller is logged in QAE10_GR03_seller@binar.com 4IKJKomARpjPH7aiyRZ0CQ==.passed And the seller navigates to the "Product Saya" page.........................passed And the seller clicks on the product........................................passed And the seller clicks on the "Edit" button..................................passed When the seller leaves the to-be-edited product category field empty and fills valid product name Notebook, price 8000000, description Used notebook and image C://Uploads//laptop-2.jpeg.passed And clicks on the "Terbitkan" button........................................passed Then an error message for the empty product category should be displayed....passed And the seller remains on the "Edit Product" page...........................passed

testcase.name: Seller edits a product with an empty product name
testcase.system-out: When the seller enters an empty the to-be-edited product name and fills valid product price 8000000, category 1, description Used notebook and image C://Uploads//laptop-2.jpeg.passed And clicks on the "Terbitkan" button........................................passed Then an error message for the empty product name should be displayed........passed And the seller remains on the "Edit Product" page...........................passed

testcase.name: Seller edits a product with an empty product price
testcase.system-out: When the seller leaves the to-be-edited product price field empty and fills valid product name Notebook, category 1, description Used notebook and image C://Uploads//laptop-2.jpeg.passed And clicks on the "Terbitkan" button........................................passed Then an error message for the empty product price should be displayed.......passed And the seller remains on the "Edit Product" page...........................passed

testcase.name: Seller edits a product with an empty product description
testcase.system-out: When the seller leaves the to-be-edited product description field empty and fills valid product name Notebook, price 8000000, category 1 and image C://Uploads//laptop-2.jpeg.passed And clicks on the "Terbitkan" button........................................passed Then an error message for the empty product description should be displayed.passed And the seller remains on the "Edit Product" page...........................passed

testcase.name: Seller edits a product with all valid details
testcase.system-out: When the seller fills valid to-be-edited product name Notebook, price 8000000, category 1, description Used notebook and image C://Uploads//laptop-2.jpeg.passed And clicks on the "Terbitkan" button........................................passed Then the edited product is submitted with valid information Hobi, Rp 8.000.000, Used notebook, Seller QA Group 03 Wave 10, Jakarta.passed
